languages.text: "Пускай и по-своему, но жители Кетца Темера верят в Бога-Императора всей душой. Но Адептус Министорум наверняка посчитало бы подобное поклонение ересью".
"The people of Quetza Temer believe wholeheartedly in the God-Emperor, albeit after their own fashion. However, the Adeptus Ministorum would likely deem such worship to be heretical."
languages.original_text: "Пускай и по-своему, но жители Кетца Темера верят в Бога-Императора всей душой. Но Адептус Министорум наверняка посчитало бы подобное поклонение ересью".

traits.locale_text: "The people of Quetza Temer believe wholeheartedly in the God-Emperor, albeit after their own fashion. However, the Adeptus Ministorum would likely deem such worship to be heretical."
"The people of Quetza Temer believe wholeheartedly in the God-Emperor, albeit after their own fashion. However, the Adeptus Ministorum would likely deem such worship to be heretical."

"The people of Quetza Temer believe wholeheartedly in the God-Emperor, albeit after their own fashion. However, the Adeptus Ministorum would likely deem such worship to be heretical."

languages.text: “格扎尔特默的人们全心全意地崇拜着神皇，尽管是以他们自己的方式。然而，国教教会的牧师却会认为这样的崇拜是异端邪说。”
languages.original_text: "The people of Quetza Temer believe wholeheartedly in the God-Emperor, albeit after their own fashion. However, the Adeptus Ministorum would likely deem such worship to be heretical."

traits.locale_text: “格扎尔特默的人们全心全意地崇拜着神皇，尽管是以他们自己的方式。然而，国教教会的牧师却会认为这样的崇拜是异端邪说。”

languages.text: "Die Bewohner von Quetza Temer glauben mit ganzem Herzen an den Gottimperator, wenn auch auf ihre eigene Weise. Doch das Adeptus Ministorum würde eine solche Form der Anbetung wohl als Ketzerei einstufen."
languages.original_text: "The people of Quetza Temer believe wholeheartedly in the God-Emperor, albeit after their own fashion. However, the Adeptus Ministorum would likely deem such worship to be heretical."

traits.locale_text: "Die Bewohner von Quetza Temer glauben mit ganzem Herzen an den Gottimperator, wenn auch auf ihre eigene Weise. Doch das Adeptus Ministorum würde eine solche Form der Anbetung wohl als Ketzerei einstufen."

languages.text: «Los habitantes de Quetza Temer creen de todo corazón en el Dios Emperador, aunque a su propio modo. Aun así, seguro que el Adeptus Ministorum tacharía su culto de herejía».
languages.original_text: "The people of Quetza Temer believe wholeheartedly in the God-Emperor, albeit after their own fashion. However, the Adeptus Ministorum would likely deem such worship to be heretical."

traits.locale_text: «Los habitantes de Quetza Temer creen de todo corazón en el Dios Emperador, aunque a su propio modo. Aun así, seguro que el Adeptus Ministorum tacharía su culto de herejía».

languages.text: « Les habitants de Quetza Temer croient de tout cœur en l'Empereur-Dieu, mais à leur façon. Cependant, un tel culte serait certainement considéré comme hérétique par l'Adeptus Ministorum. »
languages.original_text: "The people of Quetza Temer believe wholeheartedly in the God-Emperor, albeit after their own fashion. However, the Adeptus Ministorum would likely deem such worship to be heretical."

traits.locale_text: « Les habitants de Quetza Temer croient de tout cœur en l'Empereur-Dieu, mais à leur façon. Cependant, un tel culte serait certainement considéré comme hérétique par l'Adeptus Ministorum. »

languages.text: 「ケツァ・テメルの人々は、彼らなりの流儀ではあるものの、神帝陛下を心から信じています。ですが、帝国宗務局は、そのような崇拝を異端視するでしょう」
languages.original_text: "The people of Quetza Temer believe wholeheartedly in the God-Emperor, albeit after their own fashion. However, the Adeptus Ministorum would likely deem such worship to be heretical."

traits.locale_text: 「ケツァ・テメルの人々は、彼らなりの流儀ではあるものの、神帝陛下を心から信じています。ですが、帝国宗務局は、そのような崇拝を異端視するでしょう」

languages.text: "Quetza Temer halkı, kendine has kuşkularına rağmen Tanrı İmparator'a tüm kalbiyle inanır. Ancak Adeptus Ministorum, böylesi bir ibadeti muhtemelen kâfirce görecektir."
languages.original_text: "The people of Quetza Temer believe wholeheartedly in the God-Emperor, albeit after their own fashion. However, the Adeptus Ministorum would likely deem such worship to be heretical."

traits.locale_text: "Quetza Temer halkı, kendine has kuşkularına rağmen Tanrı İmparator'a tüm kalbiyle inanır. Ancak Adeptus Ministorum, böylesi bir ibadeti muhtemelen kâfirce görecektir."
